name: Divine Trial Progression Requirements
description: Mandatory progression timeline and requirements for divine trial completion within the story structure.
design_philosophy: Ensures all players experience the full divine positioning system as integral story content rather than optional side activities.

act1_completion_requirement.description: All players must complete their full divine positioning by the end of Act 1
act1_completion_requirement.fundamental_trio_completion: All three Fundamental God trials (Pyrion, Glacius, Voltharion) must be completed during Act 1
act1_completion_requirement.primal_trio_completion: All three Primal God trials (Serafina, Aurelius, Korthak) must be completed during Act 1
act1_completion_requirement.positioning_determination: Player's elemental affinity pattern and primal opposition pattern are permanently established at Act 1 conclusion
act1_completion_requirement.story_integration: Divine positioning becomes integral to character identity and capabilities for Acts 2-3
act1_completion_requirement.no_postponement: Players cannot defer divine trial completion - all six trials are mandatory Act 1 content

trial_distribution.early_act1: Introduction to divine trial concepts and first trial experiences
trial_distribution.mid_act1: Active trial completion phase with player choice opportunities
trial_distribution.late_act1: Final trial completions and positioning confirmation
trial_distribution.act1_conclusion: Full divine alignment buffs activate, character archetypes locked in

mechanical_enforcement.story_gates: Act 2 content requires completed divine positioning
mechanical_enforcement.character_progression: Divine alignment bonuses essential for Act 2+ challenges
mechanical_enforcement.narrative_continuity: Character's divine relationships established for cosmic storyline
mechanical_enforcement.hexagonal_integration: Full hexagonal layer positioning needed for advanced character development
